page.title: 14ANNUAL GYMKHANA
page.content: At the Grimsthorpe gymkhanas lots of horses and ponies go there.There is even a dog parade.The ponies all get dressed up in their fancy dress and the riders get dressed up too.Then they get ready for the proper games.There is a potato race.That is where you have to pick up potatoes,put them in a bucket and stay in the saddle.There is a apple bobbing game.That is where you get off and get an apple,then get back on and ride to the finish.There are lots more games to play.But there is show jumping aswell.There is even cross-country.That is where there are very hard jumps.They have to jump down very steep hills and some of the horses get injured.They have to get to the finish at a certain time.The one who gets the fastest time is the winner.
